EmailTemplate.description: Used for sending Notification emails (via Campaigns)
EmailTemplate.name: ISS email from notification - CNS
EmailTemplate.subject: New notification on your CNS portal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!$Label.ISSP_Email_do_not_reply} {!Community_Name}
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Receiving_User.FirstName} {!Receiving_User.LastName},
A new notification has been posted on your IATA portal account. You can find it in 'My Notifications' on the portal Home Page.
Subject: "{!Notification__c.Subject__c} "
You can access it on your IATA Customer Portal
Thank you in advance, IATA Customer Service
